scripts.copy:libs: copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/bootstrap/**/*" "wwwroot/lib/bootstrap" && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/animate.css/animate.min.css" wwwroot/lib/animate && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/three/**/*" wwwroot/lib/three && copyfiles -u 3 "node_modules/gsap/dist/*.min.js" wwwroot/lib/gsap && copyfiles -u 4 "node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/*.min.css" wwwroot/lib/fontawesome/css && copyfiles -u 4 "node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/*" wwwroot/lib/fontawesome/webfonts && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.css" wwwroot/lib/swiper && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.js" wwwroot/lib/swiper && copyfiles -u 5 "node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min.js" wwwroot/lib/popper
